    • Method Detail

      • getValidSpecialties

        java.util.List<Specialty> getValidSpecialties()
        Returns a list of all specialties valid for new calulations, sorted by name.

      • startNewCalculation

        Calculation startNewCalculation(int patientId)
        Initiates a new calculation for a particular patient.
        Parameters:
        patientId - the patient identifier (DFN)
        Returns:
        the newly-started calculation object

      • setSpecialty

        void setSpecialty(Calculation calculation,
                java.lang.String specialtyName)
                  throws InvalidIdentifierException
        Sets the specialty for the Calculation, moving the Calculation into the next step of the workflow.
        Parameters:
        calculation -
        specialtyName -
        Throws:
        InvalidIdentifierException - if the specialty name is invalid

      • runCalculation

        CalculationResult runCalculation(Calculation calculation,
                               java.util.Collection<Value> variableValues)
                                 throws MissingValuesException
        Runs the calculation with the given input values.
        Parameters:
        calculation - the in-progress calculation
        variableValues - the input values
        Returns:
        the results as a CalculationResult object
        Throws:
        MissingValuesException - if any required values are missing

      • signRiskCalculation

        VistaPatientDao.SaveNoteCode signRiskCalculation(CalculationResult result,
                                               java.lang.String electronicSignature)
        Saves the given calculation result to VistA.
        Parameters:
        result - the result to save
        electronicSignature - the electronic signature code of the signing user
        Returns:
        one of the VistaPatientDao.SaveNoteCode return codes
